item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI O1 System Card (44 points | 8 comments)
2. 7 Databases in 7 Weeks for 2025 (84 points | 15 comments)
3. PaliGemma 2: Powerful Vision-Language Models, Simple Fine-Tuning (20 points | 1 comment)

5. cli53 – Command line tool for Amazon Route 53 (22 points | 3 comments)
6. Keye (YC F24) Is Hiring – Senior Software Engineer ( | hide)
7. OpenAI confirms new $200 monthly subscription, ChatGPT Pro (28 points | 6 comments)
8. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (40 points | 28 comments)
9. Show HN: Replace "hub" by "ingest" in GitHub URLs for a prompt-friendly extract (85 points | 30 comments)
10. Diátaxis – A systematic approach to technical documentation authoring (400 points | 97 comments)

12. Federal Court Says Dismantling a Phone to Install Firmware Isn't a 'Search' (155 points | 66 comments)
13. Genie 2: A large-scale foundation world model (1159 points | 384 comments)
14. Exploring inference memory saturation effect: H100 vs. MI300x (11 points | 4 comments)

20. Positioning single atoms with a scanning tunnelling microscope (1990) (5 points | 1 comment)
21. Surgeon General says loneliness is driving US into anxiety and pessimism (34 points | 48 comments)
22. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (1147 points | 454 comments)
23. Move semantics in Rust, C++, and Hylo (88 points | 101 comments)
24. AI helps researchers dig through old maps to find lost oil and gas wells (217 points | 96 comments)
25. VectorChord: Store 400k Vectors for $1 in PostgreSQL (144 points | 38 comments)
26. Show HN: Outerbase Studio – Open-Source Database GUI (312 points | 132 comments)
27. Why America's economy is soaring ahead of its rivals (440 points | 1976 comments)
28. Native dual-range input (240 points | 43 comments)
29. Show HN: I combined spaced repetition with emails so you can remember anything (218 points | 79 comments)
30. The story of Rogue (249 points | 98 comments)
